resources.string:
Im John Wick. 

I am a professional hitman. 

Smiling is a waste of time. 

Precision with colts is awesome. 
I can reload my weapons with one hand. 

Training made me awesome. And talent. 

I am greeted by everyone as if they know me. If I cared enough it would confuse me. 

My suits are really nice but I really do not care how they look; I am here to do my job. 

Really nice cars get destroyed around me often. 

These movies and stories don't seem to care if I'm happy or want a career change. 

Rainy nights are cool.
